snippet: The work, featuring the mezzo-soprano Sasha Cooke, was conducted by Alan Gilbert at David Geffen Hall.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews program including premiere of Marc Neikrug's Canta-Concerto, performed by New York Philharmonic and mezzo-soprano Sasha Cooke, at David Geffen Hall.
lead_paragraph: The work, featuring the mezzo-soprano Sasha Cooke, was conducted by Alan Gilbert at David Geffen Hall.

headline.main: Review: ‘Canta-Concerto’ by Marc Neikrug by the New York Philharmonic
headline.print_headline: Wordless Songs in a Search for Meaning
